description: Retrieves the authorized targets for an IAM Identity Center access scope for an application.

parameters.name: ApplicationArn
parameters.description: Specifies the ARN of the application with the access scope that you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: Scope
parameters.description: Specifies the name of the access scope for which you want the authorized targets.

nested_items.name: Scope
nested_items.description: The name of the access scope that can be used with the authorized targets.

nested_items.name: AuthorizedTargets
nested_items.description: An array of authorized targets associated with this access scope.
